summary: Create a premium travel and car rental platform for Blackrays Car Rentals & Tours and Travels, inspired by MakeMyTrip and Uber ‚Äî combining luxury car rental booking (Uber-style) with full travel booking capabilities (MakeMyTrip-style). The platform should feature a consumer-friendly, error-free premium interface with direct flight and railway ticket booking via third-party APIs, alongside existing tour packages, custom travel packages, and car rentals.
architectural_notes: Plan for handling ~10,000 visits/day (performance/scalability considerations for frontend and canister APIs).
Flight and railway ticket booking must use live third-party APIs (e.g., Amadeus for flights, IRCTC/RailConnect for railways) to enable direct consumer bookings ‚Äî not just inquiry capture.
Hotel booking requires integration with a real-time hotel API (e.g., Booking.com, Hotels.com, Amadeus Hotel API, or similar) covering India and international properties.
known_issues: Email and phone/SMS alerts requested, but platform/account currently does not support enabling outbound email/SMS notifications (blocked feature).
Domain name must be 5‚Äì50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens; current domain string is invalid.
Live flight/railway API integration requires valid API credentials and potential regulatory/partnership approvals (e.g., IRCTC agent registration); may not be immediately available.
Real-time hotel booking API integration requires valid API credentials and partnership/affiliate approvals with hotel aggregators.
